name: plain-text-feed
label: Plain Text Feed
description:
Plain Text Feed can be used to fetch IP addresses from a text file from any publicly hosted url.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the URL to which you will connect and fetch the data.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL to which you will connect and fetch the data.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specify whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specify whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of IP addresses from the url that you have specified in the configuration.
operations.title: Get Indicators
